name: Goat Madness
description:
--New Map with Giant LION, DEER, ELEPHANT
--DINOSAURS now included (T-Rex and Triceratops)
--GIANT SPIDER now included
--LEADERBOARD now included - compete with your friends for the High Score.

Hint : To find the Dinosaurs, turn LEFT or RIGHT from the starting point

Most recent update also includes

People to throw around, TREES to Knock Over, New objects, new sounds

Goats. Here is one.
He can go around and hit stuff. He hit stuff, he score points. Easy.

I dont know why, but its fun. Really fun. Really.


The fun 3D goat simulator game. Fun game sounds, fun goat sounds. Not much more to say about it. There are Tanks, Cars, Towers, Barrels, Crates, Airplanes. All of them can be hit by the goat. Enjoy.

The Free version gives you 2:45 of playing time. If you want more playing time, please upgrade to the pro version where you get 5:00 per game.
